content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/CUSTOMER/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

CREATE DATABASE tpchdb COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://integraadls.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/CUSTOMER/data_0_0_0.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET',
        DATAFILETYPE = 'WIDEchar'
    ) 
 AS [r]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://integraadls.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/CUSTOMER/*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
    [C_COMMENT] VARCHAR (4000) ,
    C_MKTSEGMENT VARCHAR(4000),
    C_PHONE VARCHAR (4000),
    C_ADDRESS VARCHAR (4000),
    C_NAME VARCHAR (4000),
    C_CUSTKEY VARCHAR(4000),
    C_NATIONKEY varchar(100)
    )
AS [r]
ORDER BY C_NATIONKEY DESC


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://integraadls.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/CUSTOMER/*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
    [C_COMMENT] VARCHAR (4000) ,
    C_MKTSEGMENT VARCHAR(4000),
    C_PHONE VARCHAR (4000),
    C_ADDRESS VARCHAR (4000),
    C_NAME VARCHAR (4000),
    C_CUSTKEY DECIMAL,
    C_NATIONKEY VARCHAR(10)
    )
AS [r]
ORDER BY C_NATIONKEY DESC

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/SUPPLIER/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/NATION/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/REGION/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/PART/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
    P_PARTKEY DECIMAL(38, 0),
    P_NAME VARCHAR(4000),
    P_MFGR VARCHAR(4000),
    P_BRAND VARCHAR(4000),
    P_TYPE VARCHAR(4000),
    P_SIZE DECIMAL,
    P_CONTAINER VARCHAR(4000),
    P_RETAILPRICE DECIMAL(38, 0),
    P_COMMENT VARCHAR(4000)
    )
AS [r]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/PARTSUPP/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) 
  WITH (
    [PS_PARTKEY] DECIMAL,
	[PS_SUPPKEY] DECIMAL,
	[PS_AVAILQTY] DECIMAL,
	[PS_SUPPLYCOST] DECIMAL,
	[PS_COMMENT] varchar(8000)
  )
  AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/ORDERS/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) 
  WITH (
	[O_ORDERKEY] DECIMAL,
	[O_CUSTKEY] DECIMAL,
	[O_ORDERSTATUS] varchar(8000),
	[O_TOTALPRICE] DECIMAL,
	[O_ORDERDATE] date,
	[O_ORDERPRIORITY] varchar(8000),
	[O_CLERK] varchar(8000),
	[O_SHIPPRIORITY] DECIMAL,
	[O_COMMENT] varchar(8000)
  )
  AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/LINEITEM/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) 
  WITH (
	[L_ORDERKEY] DECIMAL,
	[L_PARTKEY] DECIMAL,
	[L_SUPPKEY] DECIMAL,
	[L_LINENUMBER] DECIMAL,
	[L_QUANTITY] DECIMAL,
	[L_EXTENDEDPRICE] DECIMAL,
	[L_DISCOUNT] DECIMAL,
	[L_TAX] DECIMAL,
	[L_RETURNFLAG] varchar(8000),
	[L_LINESTATUS] varchar(8000),
	[L_SHIPDATE] date,
	[L_COMMITDATE] date,
	[L_RECEIPTDATE] date,
	[L_SHIPINSTRUCT] varchar(8000),
	[L_SHIPMODE] varchar(8000),
	[L_COMMENT] varchar(8000)
  )
  AS [result]



Select 
top 100 * from dbo.orders a join dbo.customer b on a.O_CUSTKEY = b.C_CUSTKEY;


select * from supplier a join nation b on a.S_NATIONKEY = b.N_NATIONKEY

Select TOP 2000 * from customer;

select count(*) from customer;

select count(*) from lineitem;

select count(*) from orders;

select
       l_returnflag,
       l_linestatus,
       sum(l_quantity) as sum_qty,
       sum(l_extendedprice) as sum_base_price,
       sum(l_extendedprice * (1-l_discount)) as sum_disc_price,
       sum(l_extendedprice * (1-l_discount) * (1+l_tax)) as sum_charge,
       avg(l_quantity) as avg_qty,
       avg(l_extendedprice) as avg_price,
       avg(l_discount) as avg_disc,
       count(*) as count_order
 from
       lineitem
 where
       l_shipdate <= dateadd(day, -90, '1998-12-01')
 group by
       l_returnflag,
       l_linestatus
 order by
       l_returnflag,
       l_linestatus;


Select top 2000 * from lineitem;

Select top 2000 * from orders;


EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
	select count(*) from lineitem;';

select count(*) from lineitem;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
	SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/LINEITEM/*.parquet'',
        FORMAT=''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]';


EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
	SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/ORDERS/*.parquet'',
        FORMAT=''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]';

select count_big (*) from lineitem; -- 59,999,994,267
select count_big (*) from orders; -- 15,000,000,000
select count_big (*) from customer; -- 1,500,000,000
select count_big (*) from supplier; -- 100,000,000
select count_big (*) from nation; -- 25
select count_big (*) from region; -- 5
select count_big (*) from part; -- 2,000,000,000
